column4: problem, i did a 'mount -t tmpfs none /var/tmp' and my system is gonna get screwed if i reboot
how do i copy the contents back to the main drive?
In Nautilus, select it all, copy it and then paste it or drag/drop it onto another Nautilus window on the other drive. Alternately do cp <source file> <destination>
just cp -Rp should preserve ownership and permissions and whatnot
